Misteri Gareth Bale: Dinilai Tidak Fit di Real Madrid, tapi Dipanggil Timnas Wales
06 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gareth Bale tampaknya bakal selalu mengundang tanya selama masih membela Real Madrid. Selain berita transfer yang tak kunjung usai, setiap tindakan Bale selalu berada dalam sorotan media.
Bale belum bermain untuk Real Madrid sejak jeda internasional terakhir. Dia menderita cedera ketika membela Timnas Wales pada laga melawan Kroasia.
Bos Los Blancos, Zinedine Zidane berulang kali mengatakan bahwa Bale memang masih belum fit. Kondisi Bale memang berangsur-angsur membaik, tapi Zidane bersikeras penyerang andalannya itu belum siap turun ke lapangan.
Anehnya, Timnas Wales tetap memanggil Bale untuk mengarungi jeda internasional pekan depan. Keputusan ini tentu mengundang tanya: siapa yang benar dan siapa yang salah?

Mystery of Gareth Bale: Assessed Not Fit at Real Madrid, but Called by Wales National Team
Nov 6 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gareth Bale seems to be always inviting questions while still defending Real Madrid. Aside from the never-ending transfer news, Bale's every action is always in the media spotlight.
Bale hasn't played for Real Madrid since the last international break. He suffered an injury while defending the Wales national team in the match against Croatia.
Los Blancos boss, Zinedine Zidane repeatedly said that Bale was still not fit. Bale's condition has gradually improved, but Zidane insisted his attacker was not ready to go to the field.
Strangely, the Wales national team still calls Bale to sail the international break next week. This decision certainly invites to ask: who is right and who is wrong?
